it.polimi.se2018.utils

Class XMLFileReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.utils.XMLFileReader

  • public final class XMLFileReader
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that manages the access to xml files (toolcards and windowpatterns).
    Author:
    Federico Haag

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static org.w3c.dom.Document getFileDocument(java.lang.String path)
      Returns the Document instance of the given file (by path name)
      static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getFilesNames(java.lang.String path)
      Given a path returns the list of all .xml files in that path as a list of filenames (just the name, no path, no extension - is obviously .xml).

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • getFilesNames

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getFilesNames(java.lang.String path)
                                                      throws java.io.IOException
        Given a path returns the list of all .xml files in that path as a list of filenames (just the name, no path, no extension - is obviously .xml).
        Parameters:
        path - the path to explore
        Returns:
        the list of all .xml files in that path as a list of filenames (just the name, no path, no extension - is obviously .xml)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if something during reading from file system fails

      • getFileDocument

        public static org.w3c.dom.Document getFileDocument(java.lang.String path)
                                            throws java.io.IOException,
                                                   javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                                                   org.xml.sax.SAXException
        Returns the Document instance of the given file (by path name)
        Parameters:
        path - pathname of the file
        Returns:
        the Document instance of the given file (by path name)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if something in opening the file fails
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException - if build of a new document fails
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - if parsing of the document fails
